en-US.summary: Translate a word or sentence from English to multiple languages.
examplePhrases: Alexa ask my interpreter to translate hello
Alexa ask my interpreter to change language to spanish
en-US.name: My Interpreter
en-US.description:
My Interpreter can dynamically translate text between hundreds of language pairs. Select a target language and pass a word or sentence to return a translated dictation of that text. My Interpreter uses both a translation model as well as a generative voice synthesis model to emulate human-like voice dictation reflecting proper accent and intonation.

Supported Languages: Arabic, Hindi, Italian, French, German, Japanese, Chinese, Portuguese, Russian, Thai, Spanish

Usage Directions:

Launch: "Alexa open my interpreter."

Select Language: "Change language to _target_language_."
Example: "Change language to Thai."

Run Translation: "Translate _word_or_phrase_."
Example: "Translate How are you?"

The application will remember your target language but it can also be changed at any time.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions:
*I only edited the privacy policy and icons, code is the same.

Sample Testing Instructions.

Open the application: Alexa open my interpreter.
Run a Translation: Translate Hello
Change Target Language: Change Language to Spanish
Upgrade to Unlimited Queries: Purchase Unlimited Queries

You can do one shot queries.
Alexa ask my interpreter to translate How Are you?
Alexa ask my interpreter to change language to Spanish

Or you can open the app and interact.
